title: Samuel Kostman Testimony - Polish Original
description: Original Polish testimony of Samuel Kostman, recorded April 14-15, 1960 by Ryszard Luninski. Kostman recounts his experiences as a Jewish resistance fighter in Borysław before WWII, his 10-year prison sentence for defending Jews against antisemitic attacks, his escape during the 1939 evacuation, service in the Red Army, and post-war life in Poland before emigrating to Israel in 1958.
